headline: Simon Property Group, Inc. (SPG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Simon Property Group, Inc. (SPG) on Substacks by David. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on SPG. Simon Property Group, Inc. (SPG)’s share was trading at $148.05 as of April 16th. SPG’s trailing and forward P/E were 20.39 and 25.06 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Simon Property […]
